author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie The cheque was posted to me on 30 Nov last was cashed by the Speaker’s Bank on 5 Dec. The cheque bears the stamp of the National Bank, Charing Cross: it was drawn for five shillings and is endorsed ‘James A Joyce’. Please send some of my verses to Macmillan’s Magazine in my name mentioning Sat. Review &c. I have finished Chaps XV. XVI and XVII, and am now at Chap XVIII. Why are there no letters? Jim
